Vinegar Syndrome's offering of Too Naughty To Say No on DVD
is without a doubt the best digital home video version of the film!
There has been two other DVD versions (but, the two previous versions can't hold a candle to this remastered edition) Caballero release (2000) and Pure Play (2004) Caballero Classic releases are infamous for being poor transfers
The Caballero version is also out of print and super expensive for a glorified VHS-Rip onto dvd
 the PQ on the "older" DVD's looked like VHS quality
You could easily call this version a collector's edition
Scanned and Restored in 2k from 35mms negative
It comes super close to a HD blue ray..... A impressive looking print of the film
It also has a Auido commentary with writter/director Victor Nye and producer Suze Randall
If the price seems a bit overpriced buy direct from Vinegar Syndrome (Love Amazon but, they need to price match various companies better)
Cast Include:  Angel,Ginger Lynn, Cody Nicole,Harry Reems, Jamie Gillis, Lisa De Leeuw, Raven

The famous 1984 big budget Suze Randall classic that breaks all the sex taboos. Too Naughty To Say No features a blasphemous attitude toward religion with a storyline about a college girl gone bad starring Angel and Ginger Lynn.
